Torgatine Empire.description: The Torgatine Empire is a militaristic nation. It survived major conflicts, including the rebellion that destroyed Atharnac.

Eventrope Republic.description: The Eventrope Republic was founded on democracy and united smaller states against the expansion of the Torgatine Empire.

Xavier.description: Xavier was a prisoner who was experimented on by Gorvan Hallow. He now seeks to escape the grasp of the Torgatine Empire.

Gorvan Hallow.description: Gorvan Hallow was a researcher in the Torgatine Empire who conducted experiments on captives such as Xavier.

Atharnac.description: Atharnac was a city destroyed in a magical disaster, resulting in the cursed Dead Forest.

Dead Forest.description: The Dead Forest was once Atharnac before it was obliterated by a failed rebellion against the Torgatine Empire.
